item.title: The 12 Best Wilderness Survival Movies, Including Cast Away & The Martian
item.description: The best wilderness survival movies depict the fear, desperation, and triumph that come from deciding to live in the face of uncaring nature.

item.title: The Monkey Brings Back A Great Horror Subgenre Pioneered By Sam Raimi & John Landis
item.description: With its gory gags and splatstick humor, The Monkey brings back a classic horror subgenre that was originally pioneered by Sam Raimi and John Landis.
